original_text: and you have been filled in him, who is the head of all rule and authority.
korean_text: 너희도 그 안에서 충만하여졌으니 그는 모든 통치자와 권세의 머리시라

sentences.original_text: and you have been filled in him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 그 안에서 가득 채워졌습니다

sentences.original_text: who is the head of all rule and authority.
